column5: First time to Melchett, August 24th, looking forward to the trip.
We'll be looking for a little intel when we meet you guys on the dock. We'll be flying in on the 31st. See you then.
We are heading also to Meta Lake Lodge the same week as JULS!
Sounds good Bstar, hopefully we'll have a good report for you.
what is the web site for Beteau Lake
Mellchett Aug 10-17 (younger brothers group in Mellchett 3-10) then back on Sept. 1-8 on O-Sullivan lake with Rainbow lodge .
O'Sullivan in July. Bill
Dave, you probably should have bought Kayedon when Remi sold it...lol. Glad to hear your still enjoying that great camp. WW
Those are some great handles Hooks!

BIGMANBIGPIKE If you Google: eddienorthadventures.ca you will have all the info available from the outfitter. A simple search for Beteau Lake or even the Attawapiskat River will yield several trip reports including some pretty spectacular photos. Cheers WW

I'll be with DStar and two others from NW Indiana at Melchett.Quote: Originally Posted by flipdipHeading up to Melchett with Boreal Forest Outfitters Aug 17th. Looking forward to seeing the improvements they have made to the camp. Flipdip, We'll be looking forward to a report from you. This is our first trip to Melchett.

Lvg fri for our annual Abamasagi TLO week. Still cant beat this walleye factory imo. We have 3 members in our group all over 70. Its a short flyin for these guys and a lake that has NEVER failed to produce 100 fish/day/boat. Chads TLO operation gets better each and every yr.
First time on a fly in for our group! Melchett lake July 15 Boreal Forest Outfitters.
Ogoki Lake with Ogoki lake outfitters at the end of August Will be our first trip out of Nakina as traditionally we have flown out of White River/Wawa area Cheers Gordy
My group and I are heading back to Beteau Lake on June 30th for Pike-O-Rama, just wondering if anyone else is fishing in the Nakina area this year and what outfitter you are going with? Cheers WW
Yes twin lakes outfitters 2nd week of july ghood luck
Kayedon Lake with Boreal Forest Outposts

Five Hoosiers and a Floridian heading up on Wednesday for a Friday morning fly-in to Tennant Lake with Twin Lakes Outfitters. Hoosiers are Hooks, Doc, Sleepy, Trophy Netter and the Hamster. Floridian is Dunkin' Bob. Only Sleepy has fished this lake before. You can expect a detailed report upon return. Fish On! Hooks
Melchett Lake with Boreal foerst outfitters Labor day week
Heading to Abamasagi July 14-21
We go to Meta Lake Lodge in August every year...67 more days until we leave!
Twin Lakes Outfitters last week on June - Lake Abamasagi
We're going to Abamasagi with TLO last week of June. Any previous experience with TLO, or on Abamasagi ? .......... Bill
Heading up to Melchett with Boreal Forest Outfitters Aug 17th. Looking forward to seeing the improvements they have made to the camp.
